project.name: Railslove
project.description: This is our website, currently managed by Tim, Jakob, and Paul. It's work in progress and we push out new features and styles every day. Watch us building the most advanced website Railslove ever had. We're currently using Rails 3.2.1.
project.what_we_did: We designed and implemented the new Railslove.com. Its architecture consists of a Github repository for static content ("Blood Bank"), an API ("Heart Chamber"), and a MongoDB-driven Rails 3.2.1 frontend app ("Thorax").
